HOME.ONE_TIME_SECRET_MESSAGING_SUBTITLE: Tɔgbɔ le secret la, na poof—woaʋɛ o!
HOME.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: Encrypted, secured and protected by Stellar Security
HOME.WITHOUT_TRACE_DESCRIPTION: Miaɖuɖe nye wɔmɔaɖo kple ɖaɖa me. Fie dzidziwo yɛ encrypted na client-side. Memaɖi wò IP address, amɛ woŋɔ, eye wò nya secret links me – kple agbɔ, nɛkpɔ.
HOME.PRIVACY_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: Wò ne na meɖe link kple secret information a wòɖe wò ne, eye wò ya na amɛ. Wɔ creating secret la, wòle password kple nye be nɛkpɔ. Nɛkpɔ secret la bɛ ye deleted 14 days wɔa.
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_DESCRIPTION: Link kple content nyuie hashed na client-side, eye nya ne, amɛ ne nye link kple content. Link si le 36 nyuie ID na ɛyɛ one-way encryption, a able to access Secret Message kple content a encrypted wɔ AES-256.
HOME.SHARE_ENCRYPTED_BY: Encrypted, secured and protected by Stellar Security
HOME.SHARE_TEXTAREA_PLACEHOLDER: Kɔ wo Secret message, password kple sensitive information *

VIEW.WELCOME_MESSAGE: Hi there, wò ŋɔ a secret message!
VIEW.INSTRUCTION: Kɔ eye send message, eya be eɖe once read.
VIEW.DOWNLOAD_MESSAGE: Download Stellar Secret na mobile, create wò secret messages
